### Quick Power Analysis
```{r}
library(pwr)

pwr.chisq.test(
  w = 0.5,       # effect size (small=0.1, medium=0.3, large=0.5)
  df = 1,        # degrees of freedom
  sig.level = 0.05, 
  power = 0.95)

```
